**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 35 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 [Oversized Chimera](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2261) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 107 **Perception** +23; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** -3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +22 **Will** +19 **HP** 220 **Three Headed** Any ability that would sever an oversized chimera's head (such as a critical hit with a vorpal weapon) severs one head at random. Losing a head doesn't kill a chimera (as long as it has one head left), but it does prevent it from making Strikes with the lost head or using the head's Breath Weapon.
**Triple Opportunity** An oversized chimera gains 2 extra reactions each round that it can use only to make Attacks of Opportunity. It must use a different head for each reaction, and it can't use more than one on the same triggering action. If it loses one of its heads, it also loses one of these extra reactions.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** dragon jaws +26, **Damage** 2d6+11 piercing plus 3d6 fire **Melee** lion jaws +26, **Damage** 3d10+11 piercing **Melee** goat horns +26, **Damage** 3d10+11 piercing **Melee** claw +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d8+11 slashing **Breath Weapon** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The oversized chimera breathes out a blistering cone of fire that deals 13d6 fire damage to all creatures in the area (DC 32 basic Reflex save). **Draconic Bite** An oversized chimera's dragon head deals an extra 3d6 fire damage. **Three-Headed Strike** The oversized chimera makes a Strike with its dragon jaws, lion jaws, and goat horns, each at a –2 penalty and targeting a different creature. These Strikes count as only 1 attack for the chimera's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after it has made all 3 attacks.
name: Oversized Chimera
